38th annual March for life on the National Mall in Washington on Monday, Jan. 24, 2011.( AP Photo/Alex Brandon)- Rep. Steve King Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) told pro-life activists in Washington on Monday that a nation that will not stand for life will not stand for long. The Indiana congressman-- who appears to have his eye on higher office- told the 38th annual March for Life that pro-lifers "will keep gathering until Roe v. Wade is sent to the ash heap of history
